content: passe-­ partout by maanel materials yarn manos del uruguay silk blend 200 grams or 600 yards / 540 meters available in 50 grams skeins = 150 yards/ 135 meters and 100 grams skeins = 300 yards/270 meters needles us 6 / 4 mm for the elastic bind off us 8 / 5 mm 1 stitchmarker blocking wires size 174 cm x 78 cm / 68 5 inches x 30 7 inches blocked gauge 14 sts x 24 row = 10cm/ 4 in stockinette stitch and blocked abbreviations k knit p purl st s stitch es rs /ws right side / wrong side of the work m middle stitch knit on the rs and purl on the ws m stitch marker m1r with left hand needle pick up the bar between the last st you knit and the one you re about to knit from the back to the front knit into the front loop m1l with left hand needle pick up the bar between the last st you knit and the one you re about to knit from front to back knit into the back loop of the st m1pr with left hand needle pick up the bar from back to front purl into the front loop m1pl with left hand needle pick up the bar from front to back purl into the back loop tutorial http //www youtube com/watch v=mkmhxrxsceo 1 notes this is a topdown triangle shawl with a 1 st center spine and 2 garter sts on both sides 4 increases are made on every rs row each row begins and ends with 2 garter sts = knit on rs knit on ws the middle stitch is indicated as m always knit this stitch on rs and purl on ws each stockinette and textured pattern of the body = 24 row and 48 sts increased stitch patterns stockinette pattern row 1 rs k2 m1r knit to m m1r slip m m m1l knit to last 2 sts m1l k2 row 2 ws k2 purl to 1 st before m m slip m purl to last 2 sts k2 repeat these 2 row 11 more times textured pattern row 1 rs k2 m1pr * k2 p2 work from * to m m1r slip m m m1l * p2 k2 work from * to last 2 sts m1pl k2 row 2 ws k2 k1 * p2 k2 work from * to 2 sts before m p1 m slip m p1 * k2 p2 work from * to last 3 sts k1 k2 row 3 rs k2 m1pr p1 * k2 p2 work from * to 1 st before m k1 m1r slip m m m1l k1 * p2 k2 work from * to last 3 sts p1 m1pl k2 row 4 ws k2 * k2 p2 work from * to 1 st before m m slip m * p2 k2 work from * to last 2 sts k2 row 5 rs k2 m1pr p1 *k2 p2 work from *
